body:
Day 18 - Manga 425*
Firstly, the male character, the good looking one, should become a power ranger. The velocity in which he goes form a normal person to "M'Lady *tips fedora cutely*" is astonishing. Really would help to keep their identities a secret if they were to learn from this guy.
Secondly, that second half looks horrible, the fat guy wasn't necessary in any circumstance, the female body looks fucking bad and the need to change partner mid book proves that the author went after quantity and not quality.
Overall, not totally bad, but almost there.
2/10.
Good but a little on the long side 7/10

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. Sorry y'all i got cursed too, you can't understimate random people curse
Translation pls... Yea I want to die
